about_the_game:
"Take this blessing from Aenor and challenge the foggy foreigners. It is a gift from the past and a heroic force to help you open up the future." Lobo, the Starwalker

At the beginning of the game, the three special second professions of Force Blader, Crossbowman, and Alchemist will be available to players with this set, and in subsequent games, you will not need any transfer certificate to freely transfer to these three special secret professions.

Feature:
1.Force Blader
The elemental power attached to the sword, into the attack, retreat can defend the full range of magic swordsman, is a special inherited occupation from the world of Aynor.

Skill introduction.
Elemental chop: elemental power will be concentrated on the weapon to attack the target, the target inflicts attribute damage.
Elemental protection: use the power of blessing to resist damage from the elements, giving the target elemental resistance effect.

2.Crossbowman
Specialized in crossbow agile warrior, in addition to having high mobility and high firepower, but also has a special close combat skills, is a special inherited profession from the world of Aenor.

Skill introduction.
Crossbow shot: Shoot multiple crossbow arrows at the target, causing multiple damage to the target.
Strong crossbow string: to the target to shoot heavy crossbow arrows, the target damage, and knock back the target.

3.Alchemist.
Combination of magic and science, has a high motor auxiliary hub, is a special heritage occupation from the world of Aenor.

Skill profile.
Mystic Potion: A potion made from a complex chemical formula, the use of which will restore the status effect on the target, but will have additional side effects.
Elemental Vial: Throw a glass jar filled with mysterious ingredients at the enemy, dealing elemental damage to the target.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7sp1/8/10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Gefore GTX750/Radeon RX 260
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7sp1/8/10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Gefore GTX950/Radeon RX 370
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

publishers: 英特衛多媒體股份有限公司Interwise Multimedia Corp.
short_description: The Force Blader who uses the power of the elements, the Crossbowman who has powerful explosive power and the Alchemist who makes mysterious potions give you three powerful special professions at once in the early game.
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, English, Russian
